Levels.NS->SD: First normal sleep session, then sleep deprivation session
Levels.SD->NS: First sleep deprivation session, then normal sleep session

EEG_SamplingTime_Open_NS.Description: Eyes-open EEG sampling time (time of day) in NS

EEG_SamplingTime_Closed_NS.Description: Eyes-closed EEG sampling time (time of day) in NS

EEG_SamplingTime_Open_SD.Description: Eyes-open EEG sampling time (time of day) in SD

EEG_SamplingTime_Closed_SD.Description: Eyes-closed EEG sampling time (time of day) in NS

PVT_SamplingTime_NS.Description: PVT sampling time (time of day) in NS

PVT_SamplingTime_SD.Description: PVT sampling time (time of day) in SD

PVT_item1_NS.Description: Overall score of itme 1(Number of lapses) of PVT after normal sleep

PVT_item2_NS.Description: Overall score of itme 2(Median reaction time) of PVT after normal sleep

PVT_item3_NS.Description: Overall score of itme 3(Standard deviation of RT) of PVT after normal sleep

PVT_item1_SD.Description: Overall score of itme 1(Number of lapses) of PVT after sleep deprivation

PVT_item2_SD.Description: Overall score of itme 2(Median reaction time) of PVT after sleep deprivation

PVT_item3_SD.Description: Overall score of itme 3(Standard deviation of RT) of PVT after sleep deprivation

PANAS_P_NS.Description: Overall score of the Positive Affect(PA) measured by PANAS after normal sleep

PANAS_P_SD.Description: Overall score of the Positive Affect(PA) measured by PANAS after sleep deprivation

PANAS_N_NS.Description: Overall score of the Negative Affect(NA) measured by PANAS after normal sleep

PANAS_N_SD.Description: Overall score of the Negative Affect(NA) measured by PANAS after sleep deprivation

ATQ_NS.Description: Overall score of the ATQ after participants' normal sleep

ATQ_SD.Description: Overall score of the ATQ after participants' sleep deprivation

SAI_NS.Description: Overall score of the SAI after participants' normal sleep

SAI_SD.Description: Overall score of the SAI after participants' normal sleep

SSS_NS.Description: Overall score of the SSS after participants' normal sleep

SSS_SD.Description: Overall score of the SSS after participants' sleep deprivation

KSS_NS.Description: Overall score of the KSS after participants' normal sleep

KSS_SD.Description: Overall score of the KSS after participants' sleep deprivation

SleepDiary_item1_NS.Description: Overall score of itme1(Time I went to bed last night) of Sleeping?Diary after?normal sleep

SleepDiary_item2_NS.Description: Overall score of itme?2(Time I got out of bed this morning) of Sleeping Diary after normal sleep

SleepDiary_item3_NS.Description: Overall score of itme?3(Quality of sleep) of Sleeping Diary after normal sleep

EQ.Description: Overall score of the EQ of participants'

Buss_Perry.Description: Overall score of the BUSS-PERRY of participants'

PSQI_GlobalScore.Description: Overall score of the PSQI of participants'

PSQI_item1.Description: Overall score of itme 1(Subjective sleep quality) of PSQI

PSQI_item2.Description: Overall score of itme 2(Sleep latency) of PSQI

PSQI_item3.Description: Overall score of itme 3(Sleep duration) of PSQI

PSQI_item4.Description: Overall score of itme 4(Sleep efficiency) of PSQI

PSQI_item5.Description: Overall score of itme 5(Sleep disturbance) of PSQI

PSQI_item6.Description: Overall score of itme 6(Use of sleep medication) of PSQI

PSQI_item7.Description: Overall score of itme 7(Daytime dysfunction) of PSQI
